mapper.select: { call UPA_ARTICLE_BASIC_INS_BY_JAMID_OR_RID( #{mainData.mediaCode.value, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{serviceDatetime, mode=IN, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=Date}, #{mainData.paperProp.pressDate, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.paperProp.pan, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{pressCategoryCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.paperProp.myun, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.paperProp.ho, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.paperProp.position, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{totalBasicInfo.reporters, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /*summary */ #{artThumb, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.tmplType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.artType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, 'Y', /*SERVICE_FLAG */ #{mainData.articleProp.embargo, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.id.value, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.id.orgId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.pcTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.subTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{rid, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }
mapper.insert: { call UPA_ARTICLE_SERVICE_INS( #{totalId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.loginFlag, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.adultFlag, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.value, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkimgFlag, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.geoLoc.addrKr, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.geoLoc.lat, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.geoLoc.lng, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{totalBasicInfo.breakingNews, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=Integer}, #{totalBasicInfo.breakingNewsCnt, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mainData.articleProp.onTheSceneReporting, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.bulkSite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.delSite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }

{ call UPA_15RE_COMPONENT_INS( #{curCompId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{curItem.type, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curIndex, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{isSrc, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.pcTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.url, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.title, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* COMP_ALIGN */ #{curItem.width, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.height, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.ksize, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.bulk, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.desc.dispYn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.desc.value, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }

{ call UPA_15RE_ARTICLE_MULTI_INS( #{totalId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, 0, 'Y', #{curIndex, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{curItem.type, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.compId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.varcharKey, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.title, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.link, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curItem.thumbImg, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', '', #{mainData.workerInfo.workerId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }

{ call UPA_ARTICLE_CONTENT_INS( #{totalId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, 1, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{totalId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'H', #{mainData.contents.body, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }

{ call UPA_ARTICLE_HISTORY_INS( #{totalId, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mainData.workerInfo.workerId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{totalBasicInfo.masterCodes, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.pcTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{totalBasicInfo.reporters, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.subTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{totalBasicInfo.keywords, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.value, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkimgFlag, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.bulkSite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.articleProp.bulkFlag.delSite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{mainData.iud, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }
